00009 ORDGF4cLiveTimeWriter::ORDGF4cLiveTimeWriter(string treeName) :
00010 ORVTreeWriter(new ORDGF4cLiveTimeDecoder, treeName)
00011 {
00012   fLiveTimeDecoder = dynamic_cast<ORDGF4cLiveTimeDecoder*>(fDataDecoder);
00013   fCrate = 0;
00014   fCard = 0;
00015   fRealTime = 0;
00016   fRunTime = 0;
00017   fChannel = 0;
00018   fLiveTime = 0;
00019   fNumEvents = 0;
00020   SetDoNotAutoFillTree();
00021   fLength = 0;
00022 }
00023 
00024 ORDGF4cLiveTimeWriter::~ORDGF4cLiveTimeWriter()
00025 {
00026   delete fLiveTimeDecoder;
00027 }

00029 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORDGF4cLiveTimeWriter::InitializeBranches()
00030 {
00031   fTree->Branch("crate", &fCrate, "crate/s");
00032   fTree->Branch("card", &fCard, "card/s");
00033   fTree->Branch("realTime", &fRealTime, "realTime/D");
00034   fTree->Branch("runTime", &fRunTime, "runTime/D");
00035   fTree->Branch("channel", &fChannel, "channel/s");
00036   fTree->Branch("liveTime", &fLiveTime, "liveTime/D");
00037   fTree->Branch("numEvents", &fNumEvents, "numEvents/s");
00038   return kSuccess;
00039 }
00040 
00041 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORDGF4cLiveTimeWriter::ProcessMyDataRecord(UInt_t* record)
00042 {
00043   // the event decoder could run into a problem, but this might not
00044   // ruin the rest of the run.
00045   if(!fLiveTimeDecoder->SetDataRecord(record)) return kFailure;
00046   FindRecordLength();
00047 
00048   fCrate = fLiveTimeDecoder->CrateOf();
00049   fCard = fLiveTimeDecoder->CardOf();
00050   if((fLength == 13)||(fLength==11))
00051   {
00052     fRealTime = fLiveTimeDecoder->GetOldRealTime();
00053     fRunTime = fLiveTimeDecoder->GetOldRunTime();
00054   }else{
00055     fRealTime = fLiveTimeDecoder->GetRealTime();
00056     fRunTime = fLiveTimeDecoder->GetRunTime();
00057   }
00058   ORLog(kDebug) << "crate-card-realTime-runTime" << endl;
00059   ORLog(kDebug) << fCrate << "-" << fCard << "-" << fRealTime << "-" << fRunTime << endl;
00060   ORLog(kDebug) << "channel-liveTime-numEvents" << endl; 
00061   for(Int_t i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00062   {
00063     fChannel = i;
00064     if((fLength == 13)||(fLength==11))
00065     {
00066       fLiveTime = fLiveTimeDecoder->GetOldChanLiveTime(i);
00067       fNumEvents = fLiveTimeDecoder->GetOldChanNumEvents(i);
00068     }else{
00069       fLiveTime = fLiveTimeDecoder->GetChanLiveTime(i);
00070       fNumEvents = fLiveTimeDecoder->GetChanNumEvents(i);
00071     }
00072     fTree->Fill();
00073     ORLog(kDebug) << fChannel << "-" << fLiveTime << "-" << fNumEvents << endl;
00074   }
00075   return kSuccess;
00076 }
00077 
00078 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORDGF4cLiveTimeWriter::FindRecordLength()
00079 {
00080   const ORDictionary* dict = NULL;
00081   if (fRunContext) {
00082     dict = dynamic_cast<const ORDictionary*>
00083       (fRunContext->GetHeader()->LookUp("dataDescription:ORDGF4cModel:LiveTime"));
00084   }
00085   if(!dict) 
00086   {
00087     ORLog(kError) << "Header corrupt!" << endl;
00088     return kFailure;
00089   }
00090   const ORDictValueI* length = dynamic_cast<const ORDictValueI*>
00091     (dict->LookUp("length"));
00092   if (!length) return kFailure;
00093   fLength = length->GetI(); // returns real value.
00094   return kSuccess;
00095 }
